home.title: Claude Skills for Designers
home.subtitle: Install-ready skills to work better, faster and achieve world class results. Built by the team, for the team.
home.ctaDescription: Contribute your own Claude skill. Upload a markdown file and we'll take it from there.
contribute.title: Contribute a skill
contribute.description: Upload a markdown file with your skill instructions. We'll review it and add it to the library.
contribute.formatNote: The file must include YAML frontmatter with at least {nameField} and {descField} fields.
uploader.dropText: Drop your .md file here or click to browse
uploader.successDescription: We'll review it and add it to the library.
install.heading: Install
install.instruction: Copy and paste into Claude to install
admin.title: Admin
skill.brief-generator.name: Brief Generator
skill.brief-generator.description: Generates complete, session-ready UX/product design briefs from raw input â€” especially voice notes and transcripts.
skill.rapid-prototype.name: Rapid Prototype
skill.rapid-prototype.description: Generates fast React prototypes to validate concepts, ideas, flows, interactions.
skill.mercado-pago-voice.name: Mercado Pago Voice
skill.mercado-pago-voice.description: Write and review content following Mercado Pago's brand voice. UX copy, marketing, CX.
skill.use-case-mapper.name: Use Case Mapper
skill.use-case-mapper.description: Maps any feature into happy, error, and edge cases. Creates flowchart in Figjam.
